sentences.en: a poor kid growing up in the ghetto
sentences.cn: 在贫民区长大的穷孩子

sentences.en: A section of a medieval city inhabited by Jews; a ghetto.
sentences.cn: 犹太人居住区犹太人在中世纪居住的城市的一部分; (城市中的)犹太人区.

sentences.en: A version of my ghetto where life felt for real?
sentences.cn: (我所知道的贫民窟,在那里,生活是很真实的)?

sentences.en: I had always been bothered by the passivity of the ghetto.
sentences.cn: 黑人区的消极顺从向来使我不安.

sentences.en: I happen to enjoy my ghetto brew affectation.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧正沉浸在我的犹太人情感中.

sentences.en: I saw that achievement as a possible pattern for the entire ghetto.
sentences.cn: 我把获得的成就看作整个黑人区可以仿效的榜样.

sentences.en: I was discovering that I could not escape the ghetto after all.
sentences.cn: 我发现自己归根到底无法摆脱黑人区.

sentences.en: One of the most atmospheric corners of Prague is the old Jewish ghetto.
sentences.cn: 古老的犹太人社区是布拉格最具特色的角落之一。

sentences.en: Racism and crime still flourish in the ghetto.
sentences.cn: 城市贫民区的种族主义和犯罪仍然十分猖獗。

sentences.en: See I'm influenced by the ghetto you ruined.
sentences.cn: 被你们摧毁的GHETTO在潜移默化我.

sentences.en: Some companies have made a profit by building low - cost apartments in ghetto areas.
sentences.cn: 有些公司在犹太人居住区建造低成本的住房而获利.

sentences.en: The visitors came and went and spread glowing reports about the paradise Ghetto.
sentences.cn: 客人的来来去去,传播着关于犹太乐园的一些热情洋溢的报道.

sentences.en: They built high walls covered in barbed wire to shut us in the ghetto.
sentences.cn: 他们建造带铁丝网的高墙,将我们禁闭在犹太区.

sentences.en: This wortnless currency is the sourest joke of the ghetto, of course.
sentences.cn: 当然,这种毫无价值的货币是贫民区里最拙劣的笑料.

sentences.en: You're fucking crazy, holmes ! You gotta get out of this ghetto mentality!
sentences.cn: 你真他妈疯了, 伙计! 你最好放弃这个疯狂的念头!

words.tran_cn: 使……成为少数民族居住区

trans.tran_cn: 少数民族的集中住宅区，犹太人区，限制区，分离区，贫民区
trans.tran_en: a part of a city where people of a particular race or class, especially people who are poor, live separately from the rest of the people in the city. This word is sometimes considered offensive.
